title: I have a problem with Dreadknight Garen skin.
body: i have the code but i can't redeem it, it says (There was a problem fulfilling your store items,please try again later....) and i keep trying but it doesn't work. since yesterday.

replies.body: No worries! Since this is a free champ/skin promo I've gone ahead and added Garen and his Dreadknight skin to your account to make it a little easier on ya ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=15kV6JmM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-13T23:00:06.127+0000)
>
> No worries! Since this is a free champ/skin promo I've gone ahead and added Garen and his Dreadknight skin to your account to make it a little easier on ya ^_^

Could you help me? Do I need to screen my code and send it to you? My loot system is also bugged i can't open any chests or capsules. I am relatively new so please bear with me
I have the same problem. I can't get the skin. It says contact support.riotgames.com

> [{quoted}](name=DeadSkillś,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=15kV6JmM,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-13T10:46:44.037+0000)
>
> i have the code but i can&#039;t redeem it, it says (There was a problem fulfilling your store items,please try again later....) and i keep trying but it doesn&#039;t work. since yesterday.

I have the same problem here. I have follow the steps and still did not unlock the skin. Please help,
I have the same problem. It says that promo is available until 10/10/2010. Can you help me please? I have keep a copy of the voucher.

Same with me, did everything they asked me to and got the code, says it is valid until 2018 but when I want to redeem it I get the same message as OP
Any help would really be appreciated
i have the same problem please help me :(
